title: Function, purpose of legis. in auth., dem. regimes

content.question: Legislatures are important institutions in both authoritarian and democratic regimes.(a) Identify a function of a legislature that is common to both democratic and authoritarian regimes. (b) Explain how a function of a legislature can strengthen democracy. (c) Describe two ways a legislature can be controlled in an authoritarian regime.(d) Explain why authoritarian regimes maintain legislatures.
